definition: Yixing county level city in Wuxi 無錫|无锡[Wu2 xi1], Jiangsu
surname Yi
proper/should/suitable/appropriate
to rise/to flourish/to become popular/to start/to encourage/to get up/(often used in the negative) to permit or allow (dialect)/maybe (dialect)
feeling or desire to do sth/interest in sth/excitement

Yixing county level city in Wuxi 無錫|无锡[Wu2 xi1], Jiangsu

sentences.english: There's only one teapot in the world , her name is called Yixing.
sentences.chinese: 世界上只有一把壶，她的名字叫宜兴。

sentences.english: It's a set of Yixing purple clay teapots.
Mr. Pan Xulun, born in 1893 in Yixing, Jiangsu. St.
sentences.chinese: 潘序伦先生，1893年生于江苏宜兴。

sentences.english: Yixing county looks from afar like a traditional landscape painting.
sentences.chinese: 宜兴县从远处看，就像一幅山水画。

sentences.english: Yixing's brown earth pottery is made of a peculiar kind of local red clay.
sentences.chinese: 宜兴紫砂陶器是由一种奇特的当地红粘土制成的。

sentences.english: The age-old Yixing ceramics turns out the newest products.
sentences.chinese: 历史悠久的宜兴陶瓷工业推出崭新的种种产品。

sentences.english: Yixing Dachen Mechanical Technology Co. , Ltd.
sentences.chinese: 宜兴达晨机械科技有限公司。

sentences.english: Our company is the largest factory specializing in producing decoration sticking panel in Yixing city.
sentences.chinese: 本公司是宜兴市最大的专业生产装饰贴面板厂家。
